de.mrapp.android.util

Class ArrayUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.mrapp.android.util.ArrayUtil

  • public final class ArrayUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    An utility class, which provides static methods, which allow to handle arrays.
    Since:
    1.11.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean contains(boolean[] array, boolean value)
      Returns, whether an array contains a specific boolean value, or not.
      static int indexOf(boolean[] array, boolean value)
      Returns the index of the first item of an array, which equals a specific boolean value.
      static int lastIndexOf(boolean[] array, boolean value)
      Returns the index of the last item of an array, which equals a specific boolean value.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • indexOf

        public static int indexOf(@NonNull
                          boolean[] array,
                          boolean value)
        Returns the index of the first item of an array, which equals a specific boolean value.
        Parameters:
        array - The array, which should be checked, as a Boolean array. The array may not be null
        value - The value, which should be checked, as a Boolean value
        Returns:
        The index of the first item, which equals the given boolean value, as an Integer value or -1, if no item of the array equals the value

      • lastIndexOf

        public static int lastIndexOf(@NonNull
                              boolean[] array,
                              boolean value)
        Returns the index of the last item of an array, which equals a specific boolean value.
        Parameters:
        array - The array, which should be checked, as a Boolean array. The array may not be null
        value - The value, which should be checked, as a Boolean value
        Returns:
        The index of the last item, which equals the given boolean value, as an Integer value or -1, if no item of the array equals the value

      • contains

        public static boolean contains(@NonNull
                               boolean[] array,
                               boolean value)
        Returns, whether an array contains a specific boolean value, or not.
        Parameters:
        array - The array, which should be checked, as a Boolean array. The array may not be null
        value - The value, which should be checked, as a Boolean value
        Returns:
        True, if the array contains the given boolean value, false otherwise
